How to go on "contents" to replace files? :S

1- Use ur mouse right buttom on the tomb rider icon after the unzip,
2- u get to a folder called Mac OX left click that one.
3- contents
4- copy paste the unziped  crack into that folder replacing the two files inside.
5- Start the games and never go on youtube looking for walkthroughs.....
